realtimebtcchart.datavisualization

Interface GraphPart

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Candle, Line

    public interface GraphPart
    GraphPart interface. A graph consists of GraphParts that can be drawn on a Graphics object
    Author:
    kallelehikoinen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(Graphics2D g2d, int yOrigin, int xOrigin, double yScale, double xScale)
      Draws the GraphPart on the Graphics given as param

      int getY2()

      • draw

        void draw(Graphics2D g2d,
        int yOrigin,
        int xOrigin,
        double yScale,
        double xScale)
        Draws the GraphPart on the Graphics given as param
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics to draw GraphPart on
        xOffset - value substracted from GraphPart x values
        yOffset - value substracted from GraphPart y values
        xScale - multiplier for GraphPart x values
        yScale - multiplier for GraphPart y values
